text: I just got accepted into my dream university! I can't believe it - I've been waiting for this moment for years and now it's finally happening!
My grandmother passed away last night. She was the kindest person I've ever known, and I don't know how to go on without her.
The flight was delayed again. This is the third time this month, and I'm sick and tired of this airline's incompetence!
I heard a strange noise coming from the basement at 3 AM. I'm home alone and too scared to go check what it is.
Wait, WHAT?! You're telling me they've been dating for six months and nobody told me?!
The way some people treat service workers is absolutely disgusting. I saw someone throw their food at a cashier today over a minor mistake.
I'm so happy but also terrified about becoming a parent. It's everything I've ever wanted but the responsibility is overwhelming.
The quarterly report shows a 3% increase in productivity and stable revenue growth across all departments.
I can't believe they would do this to me after everything I've done for them. I'm heartbroken and furious at the same time.
Just found out my childhood pet had to be put down while I was away at college. I never even got to say goodbye.
